item.title: Kubernetes metrics, logs, and traces via OpenTelemetry collector
item.description: The Problem Observing distributed systems is not a trivial task. We have several machines running, each hosting workloads that minding their business, do network calls, and print logs. That makes one think “how on earth am I gonna keep it together?”. One opinionated solution Well, there’s a widely adopted tool that works as a central piece, gracefully turning chaos into an ordered flow. It is called OpenTelemetry Collector, and this article approaches it in an opinionated way.
